author: Special Correspondent
text:
Tension prevailed in Tirunelveli Town for a while on Tuesday after unidentified miscreants vandalised the bust of V.O. Chidambaram installed near Swamy Nellaiyappar Temple outer tank on Tuesday.

The miscreants had poured a tar-like substance over the bust, and tension started escalating after the news spread in the nearby areas.

Even before the situation took an ugly turn, police intervened and the bust was cleaned. Tirunelveli Town police are investigating.
title: VOC statue vandalised
